name: R5-Immunization-R4-Immunization
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Immunization into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `Immunization` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization`

element.display: Authority that the immunization event is based on

target.comment: R5 `Immunization.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.contained`
R5 `Immunization.doseQuantity` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.doseQuantity`
R5 `Immunization.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.encounter`
R5 `Immunization.expirationDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.expirationDate`

R5 `Immunization.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Immunization.fundingSource` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.fundingSource`
R5 `Immunization.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.id`
R5 `Immunization.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Immunization.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.implicitRules`

element.display: Indicates the source of a  reported record

target.comment: R5 `Immunization.isSubpotent` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.isSubpotent`

R5 `Immunization.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `Immunization.location` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.location`
R5 `Immunization.lotNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.lotNumber`

R5 `Immunization.manufacturer` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.manufacturer` - manufacturer has change due to type change: R5 manufacturer CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 manufacturer
R5 `Immunization.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.meta`

R5 `Immunization.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Immunization.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `note`
R5 `Immunization.occurrence[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.occurrence[x]`
R5 `Immunization.patient` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.patient`
R5 `Immunization.performer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.performer`

element.display: Individual or organization who was performing

target.display: Individual or organization who was performing
target.comment: R5 `Immunization.performer.actor` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.performer.actor` - actor has change due to type change: R5 `actor` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `actor`

R5 `Immunization.performer.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.performer.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: What type of performance was done

target.display: What type of performance was done
target.comment: R5 `Immunization.performer.function` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.performer.function`
R5 `Immunization.performer.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.performer.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Immunization.performer.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.performer.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Indicates context the data was captured in

target.display: Indicates context the data was recorded in
target.comment: R5 `Immunization.primarySource` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.primarySource`

element.display: Patient eligibility for a specific vaccination program

target.display: Patient eligibility for a vaccination program
target.comment: R5 `Immunization.programEligibility` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.programEligibility` - programEligibility added a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/immunization-program-eligibility; programEligibility has change due to type change: R5 programEligibility BackboneElement has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 programEligibility

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
The program that eligibility is declared for
The patient's eligibility status for the program

target.comment: R5 `Immunization.protocolApplied` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.protocolApplied`

element.display: Who is responsible for publishing the recommendations

target.display: Who is responsible for publishing the recommendations
target.comment: R5 `Immunization.protocolApplied.authority` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.protocolApplied.authority`
R5 `Immunization.protocolApplied.doseNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.protocolApplied.doseNumber[x]`

R5 `Immunization.protocolApplied.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.protocolApplied.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Immunization.protocolApplied.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.protocolApplied.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Immunization.protocolApplied.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.protocolApplied.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Immunization.protocolApplied.series` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.protocolApplied.series`

target.display: Recommended number of doses for immunity
target.comment: R5 `Immunization.protocolApplied.seriesDoses` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.protocolApplied.seriesDoses[x]`
R5 `Immunization.protocolApplied.targetDisease` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.protocolApplied.targetDisease`

element.display: Details of a reaction that follows immunization

target.display: Details of a reaction that follows immunization
target.comment: R5 `Immunization.reaction` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.reaction`
R5 `Immunization.reaction.date` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.reaction.date`

R5 `Immunization.reaction.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.reaction.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Immunization.reaction.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.reaction.id`

R5 `Immunization.reaction.manifestation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.reaction.detail` - detail has change due to type change: R5 manifestation CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 detail

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Immunization.reaction.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.reaction.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Immunization.reaction.reported` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.reaction.reported`

R5 `Immunization.reason` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Immunization.reasonCode` - reasonCode has change due to type change: R5 reason CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 reasonCode

R5 `Immunization.reason` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Immunization.reasonReference` - reasonReference removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/immunization-reason; reasonReference has change due to type change: R5 reason CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 reasonReference
R5 `Immunization.route` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.route`
R5 `Immunization.site` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.site`

R5 `Immunization.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/immunization-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/immunization-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `Immunization.statusReason` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.statusReason`
R5 `Immunization.subpotentReason` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.subpotentReason`

element.display: Additional information in support of the immunization
Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Immunization.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.text`
R5 `Immunization.vaccineCode` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Immunization.vaccineCode`
